member.name: P:Goblintools.HID.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Goblintools.HID.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Goblintools.HID.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: M:Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.GetHidAttributes(System.IntPtr,Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.HidAttributes@)
member.summary: The HidD_GetAttributes routine returns the attributes of a specified top-level collection.
member.param: Specifies an open handle to a top-level collection.
Pointer to a caller-allocated HIDD_ATTRIBUTES structure that returns the attributes of the collection specified by HidDeviceObject.
member.returns: HidD_GetAttributes returns TRUE if succeeds; otherwise, it returns FALSE.

member.name: M:Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.GetHidGuid(System.Guid@)
member.summary: The HidD_GetHidGuid routine returns the device interfaceGUID for HIDClass devices.
member.param: Pointer to a caller-allocated GUID buffer that the routine uses to return the device interface GUID for HIDClass devices.

member.name: F:Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.HidAttributes.Size
member.summary: Specifies the size, in bytes, of a HIDD_ATTRIBUTES structure.

member.name: F:Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.HidAttributes.VendorID
member.summary: Specifies a HID device's vendor ID.

member.name: F:Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.HidAttributes.ProductID
member.summary: Specifies a HID device's product ID.

member.name: F:Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.HidAttributes.VersionNumber
member.summary: Specifies the manufacturer's revision number for a HIDClass device.

member.name: T:Goblintools.HID.NativeMethods.HidAttributes
member.summary: The HIDD_ATTRIBUTES structure contains vendor information about a HIDClass device.
